ProcessDefinition.Title: Get Objects by POI
ProcessDefinition.Abstract: Get genes at a POI (point of interest) specified in the request.

LiteralInput.Title: Atlas SRS Name
LiteralInput.Abstract: The Atlas SRS (Spatial Reference System) name.

LiteralInput.Title: X-Coordinate Value
LiteralInput.Abstract: Value in the X dimension as defined in the SRS.

LiteralInput.Title: Y-Coordinate Value
LiteralInput.Abstract: Value in the Y dimension as defined in the SRS.

LiteralInput.Title: Z-Coordinate Value
LiteralInput.Abstract: Value in the Z dimension as defined in the SRS.

ComplexOutput.Title: GetObjectsByPOI Output
ComplexOutput.Abstract: The response from this request contains URIs to images at the specified POI (point of interest).
